item.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TTV0Aa4lC04

I'm trying to stay away from the obvious, to me. WoW screen shots of peasants being chaotic.

For the 12 year old boys, and other metal lovers among us peasants, I present Kreator. Please, if you don't know what metal is do not listen to this.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E-zHNX_2RlU&feature=fvst

And now fot something entirely different...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JvKIWjnEPNY

and the most famous mob of peasants ever...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qLvGnro4Cgw&NR=1&feature=fvwp

The merry Peasant...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OT4d0EdSFuU&playnext=1&list=PL083D55B92AA27838&feature=results_video

Chaos is nothing new for our gang. Every month a new crazy theme! Lots of fun and lots of food and drink.

This is just because it is one of my favorite scenes...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=co6-tYS9k1U

 

 

 

RSVPs open 30 days prior to the event and these dinners fill up quickly. Remember there are no rules. Caryl will email the address to those attending the Wednesday before the dinner. Be sure to RSVP early as we always fill up quickly. Do RSVP though, especially if it gets you on the waiting list. Usually the waiting list people get to join us for dinner. Plan to cook on site, unless your recipe takes 45 minutes or more to prepare start to finish. Because the oven opens and closes often baked goods (excepting cookies) are best done ahead of time. Remember this isn’t just a potluck; this is about sharing the pleasure of cooking and food, and learning from one another while drinking wine 'n stuff and having great conversations. Bring what you'd like to drink plus a little to share.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event
item.name: Chaotic Peasants
